monosodium glutamate.name: Monosodium Glutamate (MSG/E621)
monosodium glutamate.cause: Known to trigger allergic reactions and headaches in sensitive individuals.
monosodium glutamate.avoid: Individuals sensitive to MSG, migraine sufferers, patients with asthma.

high fructose corn syrup.name: High Fructose Corn Syrup (HFCS)
high fructose corn syrup.cause: Rapid blood sugar spike, linked to non-alcoholic fatty liver disease.
high fructose corn syrup.avoid: Patients with diabetes, pre-diabetes, and NAFLD.

sugar.name: Refined Sugar
sugar.cause: Contributes to weight gain, high blood sugar, and insulin resistance.
sugar.avoid: Patients with diabetes, pre-diabetes, and obesity.

brown sugar.name: Brown Sugar
brown sugar.cause: High sugar content with minimal nutritional benefits.

palm oil.name: Palm Oil
palm oil.cause: High saturated fat content, linked to heart disease.
palm oil.avoid: Individuals with high cholesterol or heart conditions.

butter.name: Butter
butter.cause: High in saturated fat and cholesterol.
butter.avoid: Individuals with heart disease or high cholesterol.

vegetable shortening.name: Vegetable Shortening
vegetable shortening.cause: Often contains trans fats and high saturated fat.

salt.name: Table Salt
salt.cause: High sodium content increases blood pressure.

maida.name: Refined Wheat Flour (Maida)
maida.cause: Highly processed with high glycemic index.
maida.avoid: Individuals with diabetes or celiac disease.

besan.name: Gram Flour (Besan)
besan.cause: May cause bloating in sensitive individuals.

whole milk powder.name: Whole Milk Powder
whole milk powder.cause: High in saturated fat and lactose.

whey protein.name: Whey Protein
whey protein.cause: May cause digestive issues in lactose intolerant.

soy protein.name: Soy Protein Isolate
soy protein.avoid: Individuals with soy allergy or thyroid issues.

pectin.name: Pectin
pectin.cause: May cause digestive issues in large amounts.

carrageenan.name: Carrageenan
carrageenan.avoid: Individuals with IBD or digestive issues.

sodium benzoate.name: Sodium Benzoate (E211)
sodium benzoate.cause: Can form carcinogenic benzene with vitamin C.

calcium propionate.name: Calcium Propionate (E282)
calcium propionate.cause: Linked to behavioral issues in children.

aspartame.name: Aspartame (E951)
aspartame.cause: Linked to migraines and neurological issues.

acesulfame potassium.name: Acesulfame Potassium (E950)
acesulfame potassium.cause: Artificial sweetener with potential metabolic effects.

saccharin.name: Saccharin (E954)
saccharin.cause: Artificial sweetener with historical safety concerns.

modified starch.name: Modified Starch
modified starch.avoid: Individuals with diabetes or grain allergies.

corn syrup solids.name: Corn Syrup Solids
corn syrup solids.cause: Rapid blood sugar spike, highly processed.

glucose syrup.name: Glucose Syrup
glucose syrup.cause: High glycemic index, rapid sugar absorption.

fructose.name: Fructose
fructose.cause: Linked to fatty liver disease, high sugar content.

wheat starch.name: Wheat Starch
wheat starch.avoid: Individuals with celiac disease or diabetes.

soy flour.name: Soy Flour
soy flour.cause: May affect thyroid function, common allergen.
soy flour.avoid: Individuals with soy allergy or thyroid issues.

semolina.name: Semolina (Rava)
semolina.avoid: Individuals with celiac disease or diabetes.

bread crumbs.name: Bread Crumbs
bread crumbs.cause: High in sodium and processed carbohydrates.

oats flour.name: Oats Flour
oats flour.cause: Generally healthy but may contain gluten.

coconut flour.name: Coconut Flour
coconut flour.cause: High in fiber, may cause digestive issues.

onion powder.name: Onion Powder
onion powder.cause: High FODMAP, may cause digestive issues.
onion powder.avoid: Individuals with IBS or FODMAP sensitivity.

garlic powder.name: Garlic Powder
garlic powder.cause: High FODMAP, may cause digestive issues.
garlic powder.avoid: Individuals with IBS or FODMAP sensitivity.

turmeric powder.name: Turmeric Powder
turmeric powder.cause: May thin blood in high doses.

hing.name: Asafoetida (Hing)
hing.cause: Can cause digestive issues in large amounts.

kasuri methi.name: Dried Fenugreek Leaves
kasuri methi.cause: Strong flavor, may cause digestive issues.

citric acid.name: Citric Acid
citric acid.cause: Highly acidic, can erode tooth enamel.
citric acid.avoid: Individuals with GERD or dental issues.

sodium glutamate.name: Sodium Glutamate
sodium glutamate.cause: Flavor enhancer similar to MSG, may cause headaches and allergic reactions.
sodium glutamate.avoid: Individuals sensitive to MSG, migraine sufferers.

calcium disodium edta.name: Calcium Disodium EDTA (E385)
calcium disodium edta.cause: Preservative that can bind to minerals, potentially causing mineral deficiencies.

sodium metabisulfite.name: Sodium Metabisulfite (E223)
sodium metabisulfite.cause: Preservative that can trigger severe asthma attacks.
sodium metabisulfite.avoid: Asthma sufferers, individuals with sulfite sensitivity.

potassium metabisulfite.name: Potassium Metabisulfite (E224)
potassium metabisulfite.cause: Preservative that can cause allergic reactions and asthma.

sodium aluminum phosphate.name: Sodium Aluminum Phosphate
sodium aluminum phosphate.cause: Leavening agent containing aluminum, linked to neurological issues.

ammonium bicarbonate.name: Ammonium Bicarbonate
ammonium bicarbonate.cause: Leavening agent that releases ammonia gas, can irritate respiratory system.
ammonium bicarbonate.avoid: Individuals with asthma or respiratory issues.

calcium silicate.name: Calcium Silicate (E552)
calcium silicate.cause: Anti-caking agent that may contain asbestos contamination.

sodium ferrocyanide.name: Sodium Ferrocyanide (E535)
sodium ferrocyanide.cause: Anti-caking agent that can release cyanide in acidic conditions.
sodium ferrocyanide.avoid: All consumers, especially with kidney issues.

calcium peroxide.name: Calcium Peroxide (E930)
calcium peroxide.cause: Flour bleaching agent, oxidizer that can be harmful.

azodicarbonamide.name: Azodicarbonamide (E927a)
azodicarbonamide.cause: Flour bleaching agent that decomposes to carcinogenic compounds.

potassium bromate.name: Potassium Bromate
potassium bromate.cause: Known carcinogen, banned in many countries but still used in some Indian products.

chlorine dioxide.name: Chlorine Dioxide
chlorine dioxide.cause: Flour bleaching agent that destroys nutrients.

benzoyl peroxide.name: Benzoyl Peroxide
benzoyl peroxide.cause: Flour bleaching agent that destroys vitamins.

propylene glycol.cause: Humectant and solvent, can cause allergic reactions.

glycerol.name: Glycerol (E422)
glycerol.cause: Humectant that may cause headaches and digestive issues.

isomalt.cause: Sugar alcohol that can cause digestive issues.

xylitol.cause: Toxic to dogs, can cause digestive issues in humans.

erythritol.name: Erythritol (E968)
erythritol.cause: May cause digestive issues in sensitive individuals.

polydextrose.name: Polydextrose (E1200)
polydextrose.cause: Synthetic fiber that can cause bloating and gas.

inulin.name: Inulin
inulin.cause: Prebiotic fiber that can cause severe bloating in sensitive individuals.

olestra.name: Olestra (Olean)
olestra.cause: Fat substitute that can cause digestive issues and reduce vitamin absorption.

hydrogenated starch hydrolysate.cause: Sugar alcohol blend that can cause digestive issues.

partially hydrogenated oil.cause: Primary source of artificial trans fats.

interesterified fat.cause: Modified fat that may raise blood sugar and lower HDL.

sucroglycerides.name: Sucroglycerides
sucroglycerides.cause: Emulsifier made from sugar and fat.

datem.name: DATEM (E472e)
datem.cause: Emulsifier linked to heart muscle damage in animal studies.

whey protein concentrate.name: Whey Protein Concentrate
whey protein concentrate.cause: May cause digestive issues in lactose intolerant.

textured vegetable protein.name: Textured Vegetable Protein (TVP)
textured vegetable protein.cause: Highly processed soy product, may contain hexane.

autolyzed yeast extract.name: Autolyzed Yeast Extract
autolyzed yeast extract.cause: Contains natural MSG, may cause reactions in sensitive individuals.

smoke flavor.cause: May contain polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons (PAHs) which are carcinogenic.

caramel color iv.name: Caramel Color IV
caramel color iv.cause: Made with ammonia, contains 4-MEI which is a potential carcinogen.

annatto color.cause: Natural color that can cause allergic reactions in sensitive individuals.

disodium guanylate.name: Disodium Guanylate (E627)

disodium inosinate.name: Disodium Inosinate (E631)

hydrolyzed corn gluten.name: Hydrolyzed Corn Gluten
hydrolyzed corn gluten.cause: Flavor enhancer containing natural MSG, common allergen.

soy protein concentrate.cause: May affect thyroid function and hormone balance.

wheat gluten.name: Wheat Gluten
